explains: adj. 教育的；有教育意义的

sentences.en: We carry a range of educational software.
sentences.cn: 我们出售各种教育软件。

sentences.en: Educational success is mediated by economic factors.
sentences.cn: 经济因素影响着教育的成功。

sentences.en: Educational practice is liable to sudden swings and changes.
sentences.cn: 教育实践活动易出现突然的转向和变化。
